name: 2. Editorial Modern
description: Editorial design with Montserrat and Merriweather fonts
instructions: Create a modern editorial aesthetic with bold Montserrat headings and readable Merriweather body text. Use teal (#009688) for primary elements and amber (#F9A825) for highlights. Balance professional and approachable.

image_style.prompt: Create modern editorial-style images with clean layouts and bold typography. Use teal (#009688) as the primary color with amber (#F9A825) accents on a light background. Style should feel contemporary and magazine-like.
